TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PostBackOptions extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定如何生成客户端 JavaScript 以启动回发事件。

span.span: Specifies how client-side JavaScript is generated to initiate a postback event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许控件发出启动回发事件的客户端脚本。The class allows controls to emit client-side script that initiates a postback event. 类还提供对通过属性启动回发事件的控件的引用。 The class also provides a reference to the control that initiated the postback event through the property. 回发事件是基于传递 给方法的对象中指定的选项创建的。The postback event is created based on the options specified in the object passed in to the method. 通常, 通过 "提交" 按钮或 "图像" 按钮等元素启动到服务器的回发。Normally, a postback to the server is initiated by elements such as a Submit button or an Image button. 但是, 通过发出客户端 JavaScript, 不同的控件可以启动回发事件。However, by emitting client-side JavaScript, different controls can initiate a postback event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件的事件为允许控件引发回发事件的控件生成客户端脚本。The following code example uses the event of a control to generate client-side script for a control that will allow the control to cause a postback event. 因为`myPostBackOptions`对象的属性设置为 "Page2", 所以回发会将 Web 窗体页发布到此处未提供的另一个名为 "Page2" 的页。Because the property of the `myPostBackOptions` object is set to "Page2.aspx", the postback will post the Web Forms page to another page named "Page2.aspx", which is not provided here. 若要使用此示例, 必须将名为 "Page2" 的另一个网页添加到项目或目录中。To use this example, you must add another Web page named "Page2.aspx" to your project or directory. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions/CS/postbackoptions.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions/VB/postbackoptions.aspx.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例是一个可用于运行前面的代码隐藏文件的网页。The following code example is a Web page that can be used to run the preceding code-behind file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions/CS/postbackoptions.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions/VB/postbackoptions.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 窗体页回发的目标 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the target URL for the postback of a Web Forms page.

value.span: Web 窗体页回发的 URL。

span.span: The URL for the postback of a Web Forms page.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性`action`指定 Web 窗体页的属性的 URL。The property of the class specifies the URL for the `action` attribute of a Web Forms page. 属性可用于指定要将数据发回的 Web 窗体页, 从而导致跨页面的 post。The property can be used to specify which Web Forms page to post data back to, causing a cross-page post. 有关跨页面发送的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web Forms 中的跨页面发布](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在用户将鼠标指针置于控件上时, 如何使用对象的属性来导致跨页面回发。The following code example demonstrates using the property of a object to cause a cross-page postback if a user positions the mouse pointer on a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ActionUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ActionUrl/CS/postbackoptions.actionurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ActionUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ActionUrl/VB/postbackoptions.actionurlvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 网页中的跨页面发送

span.span: Cross-Page Posting in an ASP.NET Web Page

summary.span: 获取或设置回发事件中传输的可选参数。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional argument that is transferred in the postback event.

value.span: 回发事件中传输的可选参数。

span.span: The optional argument that is transferred in the postback event.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定在回发事件中传输的可选参数。The property specifies an optional argument that is transferred in a postback event. 此属性用于表示`EVENTARGUMENT`客户端 JavaScript 的 _`doPostBack`方法的参数。This property is used to represent the `EVENTARGUMENT` parameter of the _`doPostBack` method of the client-side JavaScript.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示窗体是否会为响应用户操作而自动回发到服务器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the form will automatically post back to the server in response to a user action.

value.span: 如果窗体为响应用户操作而自动回发，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the form will automatically post back in response to a user action; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用属性来指示 Web 窗体页应自动回发到服务器, 以响应用户操作 (例如从下拉列表中选择项)。You can use the property to indicate that a Web Forms page should automatically post back to the server in response to a user action such as selecting an item from a drop-down list. JavaScript `setTimeout`方法与 _`doPostBack`方法一起使用, 以确保在发生回发之前用户操作完成。The JavaScript `setTimeout` method is used with the _`doPostBack` method to ensure that the user action completes before the postback occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示当属性和属性都设置为`true`时生成的客户端脚本。The following code example shows the client-side script that is generated when the property and the property are both set to `true`. ```vb javascript:setTimeout('__doPostBack('__Page','')', 0) ``` ```csharp javascript:setTimeout('__doPostBack('__Page','')', 0) ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示回发事件是否应从客户端脚本发生。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the postback event should occur from client-side script.

value.span: 如果回发事件应从客户端脚本发生，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the postback event should occur from client-side script; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示回发事件是否应从客户端脚本发生。The property indicates whether the postback event should occur from client-side script. 如果将属性设置为`false`, 则不会生成任何 JavaScript。If you set the property to `false`, then no JavaScript is generated. 如果要自行`false`调用`__doPostBack`方法 , 则可以分配给属性。You might assign `false` to the property if you want to call the `__doPostBack` method yourself.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在回发事件发生之前是否需要在客户端进行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side validation is required before the postback event occurs.

value.span: 如果在回发事件发生之前要求在客户端进行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if client-side validation is required before the postback event occurs; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于指定是否需要客户端验证才能发生回发事件。The property is used to specify whether client-side validation is required before the postback event can occur. 如果将属性的值设置为`true`, 则还可以使用属性来指定在回发事件发生之前需要验证的验证组的名称。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which validation is required before the postback event occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性, 以确保在生成回发事件之前, 两个控件具有输入的信息。The following code example demonstrates using the and properties to ensure that two controls have information entered in them before the postback event is generated. `NameTextBox`和`StateTextBox`控件是验证组的一部分,但控件不是。`PersonalInfoGroup` `AgeTextBox`The `NameTextBox` and `AgeTextBox` controls are part of the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group, but the `StateTextBox` control is not. 因此, 在生成回发事件之前, 用户无需在`StateTextBox`控件中输入任何数据。Therefore, the user does not have to enter any data in the `StateTextBox` control before the postback event is generated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation/CS/postbackoptions.validationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation/VB/postbackoptions.validationvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为客户端脚本生成了 前缀。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the prefix is generated for the client-side script.

value.span: 如果为客户端脚本生成了 前缀，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the prefix is generated for the client-side script; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 HTML 特性 (如`href` ``标记的特性) 需要前缀以区分JavaScript属性和URL。`javascript:`The `javascript:` prefix is needed with some HTML attributes such as the `href` attribute of the `` tag to distinguish a JavaScript property from a URL. 类似`onclick`的属性不`javascript:`需要前缀, 因为它自动与 JavaScript 关联。An attribute like `onclick` does not need the `javascript:` prefix because it is automatically associated with JavaScript.

span.span: A that represents the control that receives the postback event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个对象, 该对象表示接收回发事件的控件。 The property returns a object that represents the control that receives the postback event. 此属性作为`EVENTTARGET`参数传递`__doPostBack`给客户端 JavaScript 的方法。This property is passed as the `EVENTTARGET` parameter to the `__doPostBack` method of the client-side JavaScript.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示回发事件是否应将页返回到当前的滚动位置并将焦点返回到当前控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the postback event should return the page to the current scroll position and return focus to the current control.

value.span: 如果回发事件应将页返回到当前的滚动位置并将焦点返回到目标控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the postback event should return the page to the current scroll position and return focus to the target control; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示回发事件是否应在回发事件发生后将页面返回到当前滚动位置并将焦点返回到控件。 The property indicates whether the postback event should return the page to the current scroll position and return focus to the control after the postback event has occurred.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个控件组，当该控件组回发到服务器时， 将引发对它的验证。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 一个控件组，当控件组回发到服务器时， 对象将引发对它的验证。

span.span: The group of controls for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定生成回发事件时要验证的验证组。Use the property to specify the validation group to validate when a postback event is generated. 仅验证指定验证组中的验证控件。Only the validation controls in the specified validation group are validated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性, 以确保在生成回发事件之前, 两个控件具有输入的信息。The following code example demonstrates using the and properties to ensure that two controls have information entered in them before the postback event is generated. `NameTextBox`和`StateTextBox`控件是验证组的一部分,但控件不是。`PersonalInfoGroup` `AgeTextBox`The `NameTextBox` and `AgeTextBox` controls are part of the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group, but the `StateTextBox` control is not. 因此, 在生成回发事件之前, 用户无需在`StateTextBox`控件中输入任何数据。Therefore, the user does not have to enter any data in the `StateTextBox` control before the postback event is generated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation/CS/postbackoptions.validationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation/VB/postbackoptions.validationvb.aspx#1)]
